mapper.select: /* pharmai.formulation.selectListFormulationCombo */ /* 유사 SMILES로 부형제 및 투여량(존재시) 조회 */ SELECT t.recom_type AS recom_type, -- "추천 구분", t.reliability AS reliability, -- "신뢰도", k.kind AS kind, -- "Kind", t.ingredient AS excipient, -- "부형제", CASE WHEN max_potency_per_unit IS NOT NULL AND max_potency_per_unit <> '' THEN CONCAT('0 ~ ',max_potency_per_unit) ELSE '-' END AS use_range, -- "Use range", CASE WHEN max_potency_per_unit IS NOT NULL AND max_potency_per_unit <> '' THEN CONCAT(max_potency_per_unit,' ',exposure_unit) ELSE '-' END AS max_amount -- "최대사용가능량" FROM ( SELECT 1 AS recom_order, 'General 추천' AS recom_type, '' AS reliability, r.ingredient, r.max_potency_per_unit, r.exposure_unit FROM chem_excipient_for_route r WHERE r.route_of_admin = #{route} UNION ALL SELECT 2 AS recom_order, '제형별 추천' AS recom_type, '1' AS reliability, d.ingredient, d.max_potency_per_unit, d.exposure_unit FROM chem_excipient_for_dosage d WHERE d.route_of_admin = #{route} AND d.pharm_dosage_form = #{formulation} UNION ALL SELECT 3 AS recom_order, 'SMILES 기반 (AI)추천' AS recom_type, param.similarity AS reliability, s.ingredient, d.max_potency_per_unit, d.exposure_unit FROM ( SELECT #{smiles} AS smiles, -- 'CCN(CC)CCNC(=O)C1=CC(=C(C=C1OC)N)Cl.Cl' #{route} AS route_of_admin, -- 'Parenteral' #{formulation} AS pharm_dosage_form, -- 'Injection' #{similarity} AS similarity -- '0.86' ) param CROSS JOIN chem_excipient_for_smiles s LEFT OUTER JOIN chem_excipient_for_dosage d ON d.ingredient = s.ingredient AND d.route_of_admin = param.route_of_admin AND d.pharm_dosage_form = param.pharm_dosage_form WHERE s.smiles = param.smiles ) t INNER JOIN chem_excipient_for_kind k ON k.ingredient = t.ingredient ORDER BY t.recom_order, k.kind, t.ingredient ;
/* pharmai.formulation.selectListRoutesCombo */ SELECT d.pharm_dosage_form FROM chem_dosage_for_route d WHERE d.route_of_admin = #{route}
/* pharmai.formulation.chemicalDBcheck */ SELECT SMILES FROM TB_CHEMICAL_TO_SMILES WHERE NAME = #{chemical}
/* pharmai.formulation.projectCreate */ SELECT FN_CREAT_PJT_ID()
/* pharmai.formulation.selectLastSeqStp */ SELECT MAX(STP_01_SEQ) AS STP_01_SEQ FROM TB_FORMULA_STP_01

/* pharmai.formulation.selectDataStep2 */ SELECT PRJCT_ID , ROUTES_TYPE , DOSAGE_FORM_TYPE , VOLUME , UNIT , USE_YN , REGIST_NO , REGIST_DT FROM TB_FORMULA_STP_02 WHERE 1=1 AND PRJCT_ID = #{prjct_id, jdbcType=VARCHAR} AND USE_YN = 'Y'
/* pharmai.formulation.selectPjtMst */ SELECT PRJCT_ID, PRJCT_NM, PRJCT_TYPE, STEP_CD, USE_YN FROM TB_PRJ_MST WHERE PRJCT_ID = #{prjct_id} AND USE_YN = 'Y'

/* pharmai.formulation.selectformulaStep1 */ SELECT STP_01_SEQ, PRJCT_ID, INPUT_TYPE, SMILE_STRING, SDF_NM, CHEM_NM, RETURN_SMILE_STRING, DOC_ID, SVG_URL FROM TB_FORMULA_STP_01 WHERE PRJCT_ID = #{prjct_id} AND USE_YN = 'Y'

/* pharmai.formulation.selectFormulaProp */ SELECT PROP_SEQ, STP_01_SEQ, PRJCT_ID, PROP_TYPE, PH1, PH2, PH3, PH4, PH5, PH6, PH7, PH8, PH9, PH10 FROM TB_FORMULA_PROP WHERE PRJCT_ID = #{prjct_id} AND USE_YN = 'Y'

/* pharmai.formulation.selectFormulaPropDtl */ SELECT PROP_DTL_SEQ, STP_01_SEQ, PRJCT_ID, PKA, PKB, CA_PERM, BOL_POINT, LOGP, BIO,
MOL_WEI, LIP_RULE, MELTING, WATER FROM TB_FORMULA_PROP_DTL WHERE PRJCT_ID = #{prjct_id} AND USE_YN = 'Y'

/* pharmai.formulation.selectFormulaDosage */ SELECT PROP_DOSAGE_SEQ, STP_01_SEQ, PRJCT_ID, PROPERTIES_NM, ORAL_YN, PARENTERAL_YN, LOCAL_YN FROM TB_FORMULA_DOSAGE WHERE PRJCT_ID = #{prjct_id} AND USE_YN = 'Y'

/* pharmai.formulation.selectDosageFormCnt */ SELECT IFNULL(SUM(T1.ORAL_CNT),0) AS ORAL_TOT, IFNULL(SUM(T1.PARENTERAL_CNT),0) AS PARENTERAL_TOT, IFNULL(SUM(T1.LOCAL_CNT),0) AS LOCAL_TOT FROM ( SELECT CASE WHEN ORAL_YN = 'Y' THEN 1 ELSE 0 END ORAL_CNT, CASE WHEN PARENTERAL_YN = 'Y' THEN 1 ELSE 0 END PARENTERAL_CNT, CASE WHEN LOCAL_YN = 'Y' THEN 1 ELSE 0 END LOCAL_CNT FROM TB_FORMULA_DOSAGE WHERE 1=1 AND PRJCT_ID = #{prjct_id, jdbcType=VARCHAR} and USE_YN = 'Y' ) T1

/* pharmai.formulation.selectListExcipient */ SELECT PRJCT_ID , CHECK_YN , EXCIPIENT_NM , USE_YN , REGIST_NO , REGIST_DT FROM TB_FORMULA_EXCIPIENT WHERE 1=1 AND USE_YN = 'Y' AND PRJCT_ID = #{prjct_id, jdbcType=VARCHAR}
/* pharmai.formulation.selectStp02Seq */ SELECT MAX(STP_02_SEQ) AS STP_02_SEQ FROM TB_FORMULA_STP_02
mapper.insert: /* pharmai.formulation.insertFormulaStp03 */ INSERT INTO TB_FORMULA_STP_03 ( PRJCT_ID, CHECK_YN, EXCIPIENT, KIND, MAXIMUM, UNIT, USE_RANGE_S, USE_RANGE_E, IPT_USE_RANGE_S, IPT_USE_RANGE_E, USE_YN, REGIST_NO, REGIST_DT ) VALUES ( #{prjct_id}, #{checkYn}, #{excipient}, #{kind}, #{maximum}, #{unit}, #{use_range_s}, #{use_range_e}, #{ipt_use_range_s}, #{ipt_use_range_e}, 'Y', #{ss_user_no}, NOW())
mapper.update: /* pharmai.formulation.copyPrjctMst */ INSERT INTO TB_PRJ_MST( PRJCT_ID , PRJCT_NM , PRJCT_TYPE , STEP_CD , USE_YN , REGIST_NO , REGIST_DT ) SELECT #{new_prjct_id} AS PRJCT_ID , CONCAT(PRJCT_NM , '_Copy') AS PRJCT_NM , PRJCT_TYPE , '02' , 'Y' , #{ss_user_no} , NOW() FROM TB_PRJ_MST WHERE PRJCT_ID = #{c_prjct_id} AND USE_YN = 'Y'

/* pharmai.formulation.copyPrjctStp01 */ INSERT INTO TB_FORMULA_STP_01( PRJCT_ID , INPUT_TYPE , SMILE_STRING , SDF_NM , CHEM_NM , RETURN_SMILE_STRING , DOC_ID , SVG_URL , USE_YN , REGIST_NO , REGIST_DT ) SELECT #{new_prjct_id} AS PRJCT_ID , INPUT_TYPE , SMILE_STRING , SDF_NM , CHEM_NM , RETURN_SMILE_STRING , DOC_ID , SVG_URL , 'Y' , #{ss_user_no} , NOW() FROM TB_FORMULA_STP_01 WHERE PRJCT_ID = #{c_prjct_id} AND USE_YN = 'Y'

/* pharmai.formulation.copyPrjctProp */ INSERT INTO TB_FORMULA_PROP( STP_01_SEQ , PRJCT_ID , PROP_TYPE , PH1 , PH2 , PH3 , PH4 , PH5 , PH6 , PH7 , PH8 , PH9 , PH10 , USE_YN , REGIST_NO , REGIST_DT ) SELECT STP_01_SEQ , #{new_prjct_id} AS PRJCT_ID , PROP_TYPE , PH1 , PH2 , PH3 , PH4 , PH5 , PH6 , PH7 , PH8 , PH9 , PH10 , 'Y' , #{ss_user_no} , NOW() FROM TB_FORMULA_PROP WHERE PRJCT_ID = #{c_prjct_id} AND USE_YN = 'Y'

/* pharmai.formulation.copyPrjctDosage */ INSERT INTO tb_formula_dosage( STP_01_SEQ , PRJCT_ID , PROPERTIES_NM , ORAL_YN , PARENTERAL_YN , LOCAL_YN , USE_YN , REGIST_NO , REGIST_DT ) SELECT STP_01_SEQ , #{new_prjct_id} AS PRJCT_ID , PROPERTIES_NM , ORAL_YN , PARENTERAL_YN , LOCAL_YN , 'Y' , #{ss_user_no} , NOW() FROM tb_formula_dosage WHERE PRJCT_ID = #{c_prjct_id} AND USE_YN = 'Y'

/* pharmai.formulation.copyPrjctStp02 */ INSERT INTO TB_FORMULA_STP_02 (PRJCT_ID , ROUTES_TYPE , DOSAGE_FORM_TYPE , VOLUME , USE_YN , REGIST_NO , REGIST_DT ) SELECT #{new_prjct_id} AS PRJCT_ID , ROUTES_TYPE , DOSAGE_FORM_TYPE , VOLUME , 'Y' , #{ss_user_no} , NOW() FROM TB_FORMULA_STP_02 WHERE PRJCT_ID = #{c_prjct_id} AND USE_YN = 'Y'

/* pharmai.formulation.copyPrjctExcipient */ INSERT INTO TB_FORMULA_EXCIPIENT (STP_02_SEQ , PRJCT_ID , CHECK_YN , EXCIPIENT_NM , USE_YN , REGIST_NO , REGIST_DT ) SELECT STP_02_SEQ , #{new_prjct_id} AS PRJCT_ID , CHECK_YN , EXCIPIENT_NM , 'Y' , #{ss_user_no} , NOW() FROM TB_FORMULA_EXCIPIENT WHERE PRJCT_ID = #{c_prjct_id} AND USE_YN = 'Y'
mapper.select: /* pharmai.formulation.selectDosage_Form_type */ SELECT DOSAGE_FORM_TYPE, ROUTES_TYPE FROM TB_FORMULA_STP_02 WHERE PRJCT_ID = #{prjct_id, jdbcType=VARCHAR} AND USE_YN = 'Y'

/* pharmai.formulation.selectListFormulaStp_04 */ SELECT PRJCT_ID , CHECK_YN , CQA_NM , USE_YN , REGIST_NO , REGIST_DT FROM TB_FORMULA_STP_04 WHERE 1=1 AND USE_YN = 'Y' AND PRJCT_ID = #{prjct_id, jdbcType=VARCHAR}

/* pharmai.formulation.selectStp02 */ SELECT A.RETURN_SMILE_STRING, B.DOSAGE_FORM_TYPE, B.VOLUME, B.UNIT, B.STP_02_SEQ FROM TB_FORMULA_STP_01 A INNER JOIN TB_FORMULA_STP_02 B ON A.PRJCT_ID = B.PRJCT_ID WHERE A.PRJCT_ID = #{prjct_id} AND A.USE_YN = 'Y' AND B.USE_YN = 'Y'

/* pharmai.formulation.selectStp03 */ SELECT STP_03_SEQ, PRJCT_ID, SORT_ORDR, CHECK_YN, EXCIPIENT, KIND, MAXIMUM, UNIT, USE_RANGE_S, USE_RANGE_E, IPT_USE_RANGE_S, IPT_USE_RANGE_E, USE_YN, REGIST_NO, REGIST_DT FROM TB_FORMULA_STP_03 WHERE PRJCT_ID = #{prjct_id} AND USE_YN = 'Y'

/* pharmai.formulation.selectListFormulaStp_03 */ SELECT PRJCT_ID , SORT_ORDR , CHECK_YN , EXCIPIENT , KIND , MAXIMUM , UNIT , USE_RANGE_S , USE_RANGE_E , IPT_USE_RANGE_S , IPT_USE_RANGE_E , USE_YN , REGIST_NO , REGIST_DT FROM TB_FORMULA_STP_03 WHERE 1=1 AND USE_YN = 'Y' AND CHECK_YN = 'Y' AND PRJCT_ID = #{prjct_id}

/* pharmai.formulation.selectListFormulaStp_05 */ SELECT STP_05_SEQ , PRJCT_ID , SORT_ORDR , IFNULL(C1, 'NULL') AS C1 , IFNULL(C2, 'NULL') AS C2 , IFNULL(C3, 'NULL') AS C3 , IFNULL(C4, 'NULL') AS C4 , IFNULL(C5, 'NULL') AS C5 , IFNULL(C6, 'NULL') AS C6 , IFNULL(C7, 'NULL') AS C7 , IFNULL(C8, 'NULL') AS C8 , IFNULL(C9, 'NULL') AS C9 , IFNULL(C10, 'NULL') AS C10 , IFNULL(C11, 'NULL') AS C11 , IFNULL(C12, 'NULL') AS C12 , IFNULL(C13, 'NULL') AS C13 , USE_YN , REGIST_NO , REGIST_DT FROM TB_FORMULA_STP_05 WHERE PRJCT_ID = #{prjct_id} AND USE_YN = 'Y' ORDER BY STP_05_SEQ
/* pharmai.formulation.selectStp5ColumnCount */ SELECT COUNT(*) FROM information_schema.columns WHERE table_name='TB_FORMULA_STP_05'

/*pharmai.formulation.selectFileData */ SELECT FILE_ID , DOC_ID , FILE_NM , FILE_SIZE , FILE_EXTSN_NM AS FILE_EXT_NM , FILE_PARTN_COURS AS FILE_RLTV_PATH , FILE_ABSLT_COURS AS FILE_ASLT_PATH , CNTNTS_TY AS CONTENT_TYPE , SORT_ORDR AS SRT_ORD , REGISTER_NO AS RGSTP_ID , REGIST_DT AS RGST_DTTM FROM TB_FILE WHERE DOC_ID = #{doc_id, jdbcType=VARCHAR}
/* pharmai.formulation.stepChangeFunc */ SELECT FN_RESET_STEP(#{prjct_id}, #{status}, #{ss_user_no}) AS RSLT

/* pharmai.formulation.selectApi4RoutesAjax */ /* 투여경로와 제형으로 CQA 항목들을 통합조회 */ SELECT d.route_of_admin, d.pharm_dosage_form, d.cqa AS cqa_kor, i.cqa_eng AS cqa_eng FROM chem_cqa_for_dosage d INNER JOIN chem_cqa_info i ON i.cqa_kor = d.cqa WHERE d.route_of_admin = #{routes} AND d.pharm_dosage_form = #{formulation} ORDER BY d.route_of_admin, d.pharm_dosage_form, d.cqa_idx ;
mapper.insert: /* pharmai.formulation.insertStep6Graph */ INSERT INTO tb_formula_stp_06_graph ( PRJCT_ID, PRETO_PATH_1, PRETO_PATH_2, PRETO_PATH_3, PRETO_PATH_4, PRETO_PATH_5, CONTOUR_PATH_1, CONTOUR_PATH_2, CONTOUR_PATH_3, CONTOUR_PATH_4, CONTOUR_PATH_5, CONTOUR_PATH_6, CONTOUR_PATH_7, CONTOUR_PATH_8, CONTOUR_PATH_9, CONTOUR_PATH_10, CONTOUR_PATH_11, CONTOUR_PATH_12, CONTOUR_PATH_13, CONTOUR_PATH_14, CONTOUR_PATH_15, RESPONSE_PATH_1, RESPONSE_PATH_2, RESPONSE_PATH_3, RESPONSE_PATH_4, RESPONSE_PATH_5, RESPONSE_PATH_6, RESPONSE_PATH_7, RESPONSE_PATH_8, RESPONSE_PATH_9, RESPONSE_PATH_10, RESPONSE_PATH_11, RESPONSE_PATH_12, RESPONSE_PATH_13, RESPONSE_PATH_14, RESPONSE_PATH_15, USE_YN, REGIST_NO, REGIST_DT ) VALUES ( #{prjct_id}, #{preto_path_1}, #{preto_path_2}, #{preto_path_3}, #{preto_path_4}, #{preto_path_5}, #{contour_path_1}, #{contour_path_2}, #{contour_path_3}, #{contour_path_4}, #{contour_path_5}, #{contour_path_6}, #{contour_path_7}, #{contour_path_8}, #{contour_path_9}, #{contour_path_10}, #{contour_path_11}, #{contour_path_12}, #{contour_path_13}, #{contour_path_14}, #{contour_path_15}, #{response_path_1}, #{response_path_2}, #{response_path_3}, #{response_path_4}, #{response_path_5}, #{response_path_6}, #{response_path_7}, #{response_path_8}, #{response_path_9}, #{response_path_10}, #{response_path_11}, #{response_path_12}, #{response_path_13}, #{response_path_14}, #{response_path_15}, 'Y', #{ss_user_no}, NOW())
mapper.select: /* pharmai.formulation.selectStep6Graph_preto */ SELECT RSLT_GRAPH_SEQ, PRJCT_ID, PRETO_PATH_1, PRETO_PATH_2, PRETO_PATH_3, PRETO_PATH_4, PRETO_PATH_5, USE_YN, REGIST_NO, REGIST_DT FROM TB_FORMULA_STP_06_GRAPH WHERE PRJCT_ID = #{prjct_id} AND USE_YN = 'Y'

/* pharmai.formulation.selectStep6Graph_contour */ SELECT RSLT_GRAPH_SEQ, PRJCT_ID, CONTOUR_PATH_1, CONTOUR_PATH_2, CONTOUR_PATH_3, CONTOUR_PATH_4, CONTOUR_PATH_5, CONTOUR_PATH_6, CONTOUR_PATH_7, CONTOUR_PATH_8, CONTOUR_PATH_9, CONTOUR_PATH_10, CONTOUR_PATH_11, CONTOUR_PATH_12, CONTOUR_PATH_13, CONTOUR_PATH_14, CONTOUR_PATH_15, USE_YN, REGIST_NO, REGIST_DT FROM TB_FORMULA_STP_06_GRAPH WHERE PRJCT_ID = #{prjct_id} AND USE_YN = 'Y'

/* pharmai.formulation.selectStep6Graph_response */ SELECT RSLT_GRAPH_SEQ, PRJCT_ID, RESPONSE_PATH_1, RESPONSE_PATH_2, RESPONSE_PATH_3, RESPONSE_PATH_4, RESPONSE_PATH_5, RESPONSE_PATH_6, RESPONSE_PATH_7, RESPONSE_PATH_8, RESPONSE_PATH_9, RESPONSE_PATH_10, RESPONSE_PATH_11, RESPONSE_PATH_12, RESPONSE_PATH_13, RESPONSE_PATH_14, RESPONSE_PATH_15, USE_YN, REGIST_NO, REGIST_DT FROM TB_FORMULA_STP_06_GRAPH WHERE PRJCT_ID = #{prjct_id} AND USE_YN = 'Y'
mapper.insert: /* pharmai.formulation.insertStp07DesignImg */ INSERT INTO TB_FORMULA_STP_07_DESIGN_IMG ( PRJCT_ID, DESIGN_IMG_PATH_1, DESIGN_IMG_PATH_2, DESIGN_IMG_PATH_3, USE_YN, REGIST_NO, REGIST_DT ) VALUES ( #{prjct_id}, #{design_img_path_1}, #{design_img_path_2}, #{design_img_path_3}, 'Y', #{ss_user_no}, NOW() )
mapper.select: /* pharmai.formulation.selectStep6Design */ SELECT PRJCT_ID, Y_VARIABLE, EFFECT, IPT_START_Y, IPT_END_Y, USE_YN FROM TB_FORMULA_STP_07_DESIGN WHERE PRJCT_ID = #{prjct_id} AND USE_YN = 'Y' ORDER BY DESIGN_SEQ

/* pharmai.formulation.selectStep6Design_img */ SELECT PRJCT_ID, DESIGN_IMG_PATH_1, DESIGN_IMG_PATH_2, DESIGN_IMG_PATH_3, USE_YN, REGIST_NO, REGIST_DT FROM TB_FORMULA_STP_07_DESIGN_IMG WHERE PRJCT_ID = #{prjct_id} AND USE_YN = 'Y'
mapper.insert: /* pharmai.formulation.insertStp07result */ INSERT INTO tb_formula_stp_07_result ( PRJCT_ID, EXCIPENT_NM, EXCIPENT_MIN, EXCIPENT_MAX, CONTROL_SPACE_MIN, CONTROL_SPACE_MAX, DESIGN_SPACE_MIN, DESIGN_SPACE_MAX, KNOWLEDGE_SPACE_MIN, KNOWLEDGE_SPACE_MAX, USE_YN, REGIST_NO, REGIST_DT ) VALUES ( #{prjct_id}, #{excipent_nm}, #{excipent_min}, #{excipent_max}, #{control_space_min}, #{control_space_max}, #{design_space_min}, #{design_space_max}, #{knowledge_space_min}, #{knowledge_space_max}, 'Y', #{ss_user_no}, NOW() )

/* pharmai.formulation.insertStp07resultImg */ INSERT INTO TB_FORMULA_STP_07_RESULT_IMG ( PRJCT_ID, DESIGN_IMG_PATH_1, DESIGN_IMG_PATH_2, DESIGN_IMG_PATH_3, CONTOUR_IMG_PATH_1, CONTOUR_IMG_PATH_2, CONTOUR_IMG_PATH_3, CONTOUR_IMG_PATH_4, CONTOUR_IMG_PATH_5, CONTOUR_IMG_PATH_6, CONTOUR_IMG_PATH_7, CONTOUR_IMG_PATH_8, CONTOUR_IMG_PATH_9, CONTOUR_IMG_PATH_10, CONTOUR_IMG_PATH_11, CONTOUR_IMG_PATH_12, CONTOUR_IMG_PATH_13, CONTOUR_IMG_PATH_14, CONTOUR_IMG_PATH_15, CONTOUR_IMG_PATH_16, CONTOUR_IMG_PATH_17, CONTOUR_IMG_PATH_18, USE_YN, REGIST_NO, REGIST_DT ) VALUES ( #{prjct_id}, #{design_img_path_1}, #{design_img_path_2}, #{design_img_path_3}, #{contour_img_path_1}, #{contour_img_path_2}, #{contour_img_path_3}, #{contour_img_path_4}, #{contour_img_path_5}, #{contour_img_path_6}, #{contour_img_path_7}, #{contour_img_path_8}, #{contour_img_path_9}, #{contour_img_path_10}, #{contour_img_path_11}, #{contour_img_path_12}, #{contour_img_path_13}, #{contour_img_path_14}, #{contour_img_path_15}, #{contour_img_path_16}, #{contour_img_path_17}, #{contour_img_path_18}, 'Y', #{ss_user_no}, NOW() )
mapper.select: /* pharmai.formulation.selectListFormulaStp_06 */ SELECT DESIGN_SEQ, PRJCT_ID, EFFECT, IPT_START_Y, IPT_END_Y, USE_YN FROM TB_FORMULA_STP_07_DESIGN WHERE USE_YN='Y' AND PRJCT_ID = #{prjct_id} ORDER BY DESIGN_SEQ

/* pharmai.formulation.selectStp07result */ SELECT RESULT_SEQ, PRJCT_ID, EXCIPENT_NM, EXCIPENT_MIN, EXCIPENT_MAX, CONTROL_SPACE_MIN, CONTROL_SPACE_MAX, DESIGN_SPACE_MIN, DESIGN_SPACE_MAX, KNOWLEDGE_SPACE_MIN, KNOWLEDGE_SPACE_MAX FROM TB_FORMULA_STP_07_RESULT WHERE PRJCT_ID = #{prjct_id} AND USE_YN = 'Y'

/* pharmai.formulation.selectStp07resultImg */ SELECT RESULT_IMG_SEQ, PRJCT_ID, DESIGN_IMG_PATH_1, DESIGN_IMG_PATH_2, DESIGN_IMG_PATH_3, CONTOUR_IMG_PATH_1, CONTOUR_IMG_PATH_2, CONTOUR_IMG_PATH_3, CONTOUR_IMG_PATH_4, CONTOUR_IMG_PATH_5, CONTOUR_IMG_PATH_6, CONTOUR_IMG_PATH_7, CONTOUR_IMG_PATH_8, CONTOUR_IMG_PATH_9, CONTOUR_IMG_PATH_10, CONTOUR_IMG_PATH_11, CONTOUR_IMG_PATH_12, CONTOUR_IMG_PATH_13, CONTOUR_IMG_PATH_14, CONTOUR_IMG_PATH_15, CONTOUR_IMG_PATH_16, CONTOUR_IMG_PATH_17, CONTOUR_IMG_PATH_18 FROM TB_FORMULA_STP_07_RESULT_IMG WHERE PRJCT_ID = #{prjct_id} AND USE_YN = 'Y'
